languages.text: {n}При словах губернатора на лбу Хейнрикса появляется складка.{/n} "Но это же не имеет смысла... что это, какая-то нелепая пародия на реювенацию? Все процедуры, о которых я слышал, значительно сложнее и кропотливее..."

{n}A furrow appears on Heinrix's brow.{/n} "But that is devoid of all sense... What is this, some travesty of rejuvenat treatments? All the procedures I have heard of are far more complex and laborious..."
languages.original_text: {n}При словах губернатора на лбу Хейнрикса появляется складка.{/n} "Но это же не имеет смысла... что это, какая-то нелепая пародия на реювенацию? Все процедуры, о которых я слышал, значительно сложнее и кропотливее..."

{n}A furrow appears on Heinrix's brow.{/n} "But that is devoid of all sense... What is this, some travesty of rejuvenat treatments? All the procedures I have heard of are far more complex and laborious..."

languages.text: {n}海因里希额头上出现了一条皱纹。{/n}“到这么做毫无意义……这是怎么回事？是在嘲弄恢复青春的疗法吗？就我所知，真正有效的医疗操作要复杂得多，也要费力得多……”
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears on Heinrix's brow.{/n} "But that is devoid of all sense... What is this, some travesty of rejuvenat treatments? All the procedures I have heard of are far more complex and laborious..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希额头上出现了一条皱纹。{/n}“到这么做毫无意义……这是怎么回事？是在嘲弄恢复青春的疗法吗？就我所知，真正有效的医疗操作要复杂得多，也要费力得多……”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは眉をひそめた。{/n}「だが、それじゃまったく理屈に合わない…これは何？若返り処置のまがい物か？俺の知る限り、正規の処置はもっと複雑で手間がかかるんだが…」
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears on Heinrix's brow.{/n} "But that is devoid of all sense... What is this, some travesty of rejuvenat treatments? All the procedures I have heard of are far more complex and laborious..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは眉をひそめた。{/n}「だが、それじゃまったく理屈に合わない…これは何？若返り処置のまがい物か？俺の知る限り、正規の処置はもっと複雑で手間がかかるんだが…」

languages.text: {n}Un profundo surco aparece en el entrecejo de Heinrix.{/n} «Pero eso no tiene ningún sentido... ¿Qué es esto, una versión sacrílega de nuestros tratamientos rejuvenecedores? Todos los procedimientos de los que tengo constancia son mucho más complejos y laboriosos...».
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears on Heinrix's brow.{/n} "But that is devoid of all sense... What is this, some travesty of rejuvenat treatments? All the procedures I have heard of are far more complex and laborious..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un profundo surco aparece en el entrecejo de Heinrix.{/n} «Pero eso no tiene ningún sentido... ¿Qué es esto, una versión sacrílega de nuestros tratamientos rejuvenecedores? Todos los procedimientos de los que tengo constancia son mucho más complejos y laboriosos...».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "Çok anlamsız... Ne yani, bir tür yenilenme komedisi mi bu? Haberdar olduğum tüm prosedürler bundan çok daha karmaşık ve zahmetliydi..."
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears on Heinrix's brow.{/n} "But that is devoid of all sense... What is this, some travesty of rejuvenat treatments? All the procedures I have heard of are far more complex and laborious..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "Çok anlamsız... Ne yani, bir tür yenilenme komedisi mi bu? Haberdar olduğum tüm prosedürler bundan çok daha karmaşık ve zahmetliydi..."

languages.text: {n}Un sillon se creuse sur le front d'Heinrix.{/n} « Mais tout cela est dépourvu de sens... Est-ce une parodie des traitements du Rejuvenat ? Toutes les procédures dont j'ai entendu parler sont bien plus complexes et laborieuses... »
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears on Heinrix's brow.{/n} "But that is devoid of all sense... What is this, some travesty of rejuvenat treatments? All the procedures I have heard of are far more complex and laborious..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sillon se creuse sur le front d'Heinrix.{/n} « Mais tout cela est dépourvu de sens... Est-ce une parodie des traitements du Rejuvenat ? Toutes les procédures dont j'ai entendu parler sont bien plus complexes et laborieuses... »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Aber das entbehrt jeder Vernunft ... Was ist das? Eine Travestie verjüngender Behandlungen? Sämtliche Prozeduren, von denen ich hörte, sind weit komplexer und beschwerlicher ..."
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears on Heinrix's brow.{/n} "But that is devoid of all sense... What is this, some travesty of rejuvenat treatments? All the procedures I have heard of are far more complex and laborious..."
